Title: All Tea, No Shadeleaf
Description:
Today is a celebration of tea - brewed, iced, and otherwise! Extravagant little cakes and biscuits too.

But there is a rare ingredient of the Isles I feel could add a whole new dimension of flavor! Deep within the crawler-infested domain of the Shiverweb Vale is a bush laden with the most wondrously uplifting leaf: Coldsnap Sagittate.

The Dragonscale Expedition was exploring that area recently. Perhaps one of them could assist?
ObjectivesText: Speak with Lilial Dawnburst in Shiverweb Vale.
